cards.rules_text:
Choose one —
• Tap up to two target creatures and put a stun counter on each of them. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
• Draw two cards.

This spell has flash as long as you've cast another spell this turn.

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature that entered this turn.
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
